textos_fuente.text: Giggles For Good - Gigglewaters MENU MENU ORDER TO GO ABOUT US ABOUT US GIGGLES FOR GOOD PRESS ROOM CAREERS FOOD TRUCKS FRANCHISING MOVIES SPECIAL EVENTS We Don’t Just Make a Burger We Make a Difference. We’ve won countless awards, including ‘Best Burger in Tampa Bay’, ‘Best Cocktails’, ‘Best Brunch’, and more. However, that’s not what we’re most proud of at Gigglewaters. It’s a program we created called “Giggles for Good”. HOW IT STARTED We launched Giggles for Good shortly after we opened as a means to raise money for different local charities every week. It has become a central part of our mission and at the heart of how we connect with our community. 2018 On Sundays, we gave local charities our theater and the choice to pick their favorite movie to play. We gave these charities 50% of our ticket proceeds, and 100% of the proceeds from the charity shots, and let them make this event their own. They added things like 50/50 raffles and information tables; some rescues even brought animals to help raise awareness and funds for so many meaningful organizations. 2020 When the government shutdown furloughed military families in the area, Gigglewaters found a way to bring some stress relief to a difficult time. We gave workers a fun night out without the worry of the outside world by providing everyone that was furloughed a free movie ticket and a free beer for each night the shutdown went on. 2020 In January of 2020, the Giggles for Good initiative went international to assist during the Australian wildfires. We took a whole weekend to play ‘Crocodile Dundee’ (donating 100% of ticket proceeds), we grilled shrimp on the barbie, worked with a local artist who painted Koala Bears for a silent auction, raffled tickets for local concerts and much more. Over that weekend, we raised several thousand dollars which went directly to Australian Wildlife Organizations. 2020 When the world shut down from the pandemic, we all felt helpless. That’s when we decided to funnel our energy into ‘Feeding the Frontlines’. We brought meals to hospitals, paramedics, firefighters, and other frontline workers all over the Tampa Bay area. During this time, we were able to deliver meals to thousands of people who were at the forefront of the crises. 2020 As the pandemic continued, we wanted to help more people who were affected, specifically those who had lost their jobs. That was when Gigglewaters began to give out lunches to anyone who needed it. Over a few weeks, we gave out free lunches to anyone out of work in our community. 2021 As the pandemic raged on and parents grappled with the realities of sending their kids to school during an uncertain time, we launched our ‘Food For Thought’ program, giving lunches, gift cards and movie tickets to show our heartfelt appreciation to the teachers who were returning to school at such a stressful time. 2021 In November, we held our Second Annual Thanksgiving Dinner, partnering up with our friends at Daydreamers Cafe & Grill to bring a full Thanksgiving meal to Pinellas County paramedics & local firefighters who work the holidays so many of us get to celebrate with family. 2021 For Teacher Appreciation Week, we did a second large gift card delivery, bringing thank you notes stuffed with GiggleBucks to every teacher, administrator and support staff at three local schools. Today Our next big project is launching our first Gigglewaters Mobile Kitchen so that we can deploy a fully equipped food truck to disaster relief sites and feed the first responders who are there on the ground, picking up the pieces. The work we’ve done through our ‘Giggles for Good’ initiative has truly written on the slate of who we are. More than ever, we are on a mission to make a difference in our community. We hope you’ll help us. Rachel talks about the history of Giggles for Good WANT TO GET INVOLVED? Your best night out, an experience you can’t help but love. When the idea for Gigglewaters was born in 2016, we had a vision of the experience we wanted to create. We knew top quality ingredients, mouthwatering, craveable entrees, exquisite cocktails and a well-curated bar, exemplary customer service and an exacting eye for details were paramount in creating an atmosphere of a thousand good times. As we’ve grown year after year, we’ve perfected how to create an experience you can’t help but love. Gigglewaters is so much more than just another restaurant. It’s the heartbeat of a community. We’re there for first dates and wedding proposals, family reunions and baby showers, movies you know by heart and share with your kids for the first time. There’s nothing like walking out into your bar on a jumping Saturday night, seeing the ear-to-ear smiles on guests’ faces and knowing you helped put them there. BRICK & MORTAR Our full service restaurant, bar & one screen classic movie theater is unlike any concept we’ve come across and we’re looking for people who are equally extraordinary. From finding a location, to build out, grand opening & ongoing operations, we’ll be there to support you every step of the way. If you’ve ever dreamed of owning your own Gigglewaters®, reach out and take the first step. FOOD TRUCKS Our Gigglewaters® Mobile Kitchen combines our award-winning food with the excitement of life on the road! Set your own schedule, be your own boss and bring the Giggles to a neighborhood near you! Our state-of-the-art Food Trucks and Trailers set the standard for a mobile Gigglewaters experience. If you’ve always wanted to live a life full of adventure and travel while running a show-stopping Food Truck, contact us and get started today. If you’ve dreamed of owning your own location, where your financial success is directly related to how well you hold to Gigglewaters’® core values, implement the systems we’ve developed, connect with your community & ensure that guests truly have their best night out, we’d love to invite you to join the Gigglewaters family of franchisees. Read about us in NASDAQ: https://www.nasdaq.com/articles/how-restaurants-are-surviving-in-todays-competitive-market Read about us in USA Today: https://www.usatoday.com/story/special/contributor-content/2024/03/27/step-into-the-world-of-culinary-magic-with-rachel-fine-wilsons-gigglewaters/73119454007/ Brand Highlights Innovative & Fun: Our full service restaurant, craft cocktail bar & classic movie theater is so much more than just another restaurant. It's truly an immersive experience for our guests. Join an Award-Winning Concept: We've amassed over 50 culinary awards, including Best American Restaurant in the State of Florida! Be More than a Number: Our early trailblazers benefit from open territories, hands-on support from leadership and full access to the executive team. Redefining Support: Our comprehensive training program lets you be in business for yourself, but never by yourself. Although Gigglewaters is a new concept, our executive team has over 45 years of restaurant experience between them. Financials Initial Investment Over $1,000,000 Franchise Fee $59,500 Royalty 5.0% Marketing Fee 1.0% Financial Requirements $350,000 Key Franchise Facts Average Unit Volume* (AUV) 2020 $1,217,047 Average Unit Volume* (AUV) 2021 $1,735,351 Average Unit Volume* (AUV) 2022 $2,011,291 Average Unit Volume* (AUV) 2023 $2,532,546.51 *as outlined in Item 19 of the Franchise Disclosure Document. The Ideal Candidate We’re looking for driven leaders who are passionate, enthusiastic, and who have the innate ability to inspire a team to accomplish something truly remarkable. Owners who understand that caring for your employees and your community is a critical component to your success. Owners who hold themselves and those around them to high standards; and who have the energy and focus to follow our system and build something magical. We're looking for candidates who align with our Core Values: Care About Community We take care of those around us. Whether it’s our co-workers, our guests or our community at large, we help first. We treat people with respect & compassion. We bring people together. Show Up When It Matters When the chips are down, we have each other’s backs. Our team members are people we can count on. We value reliability, loyalty & dedication. Sweat the Small Stuff Details are everything. We are self-motivated to perfect the fine points that improve our guests’ experience. We hold ourselves to an exacting standard. We’re knowledgeable, professional, we work clean & put quality first. What We Say & What We Do Are the Same Thing Our word means something. We are trustworthy and we tell the truth. We don’t just say yes, we make sure we can pull it off. We are accountable to the projects we take on and we have excellent follow through. Positive Influencer We are enthusiastic and believe in creating a positive experience for guests and co-workers. We are optimistic and believe it’s our responsibility to make Gigglewaters the best place to work. We take pride in what we do and we believe in creating the best night out. Frequently asked questions I have never run a restaurant before. Is Gigglewaters still a good business opportunity for me? You can definitely still own and operate a Gigglewaters® because we give you all the training and support you need. We’re looking for candidates with a willingness to work hard and a great attitude; we can teach you the rest. Am I expected to work in my Gigglewaters restaurant? It’s important to be an engaged owner with your finger on the pulse of your business. We expect that our owners will be involved in the daily business and do not allow passive investors. That being said, an owner-operator could have partners in their franchise that are passive investors. Can I invest in just the food truck? Yes! The food truck is a standalone franchise opportunity for those investors looking for a lower cost mobile business. It’s also a great way to get started in the Gigglewaters franchise family with potential to expand to a brick and mortar restaurant! Your best night out, an experience you can’t help but love. “Gigglewaters ® has emerged as a place that makes visitors feel like they are living a celluloid dream.” (-USA Today) You’ve never been to a restaurant like this. Gigglewaters ® is more than just a culinary destination; it’s an immersive dining experience that transcends the ordinary. From the moment you step through our doors, you’ll feel the energy and excitement that sets us apart. With award-winning cuisine, innovative cocktails, and an intimate movie theater, Gigglewaters ® offers a unique blend of nostalgia and community that you just won’t find anywhere else. Gigglewaters ® isn’t just another restaurant—it’s an experience waiting to be discovered. Request Info Experience the magic of bringing people together. We’re looking for trailblazers. Do you ever look around at the established franchise brands with hundreds of units and wonder what it would have been like to be one of the first? To have your choice of prime territories? To work hand-in-hand with the founders as you brought a proven concept to the masses? To be more than just another number in the system, but a pioneer that helped build a legacy from the beginning? That’s what’s on the table right now at Gigglewaters. And these opportunities don’t arise every day. Be a trailblazer in the Gigglewaters franchise family and seize the opportunity to claim your territory as one of our inaugural franchisees. Together, we’ll work shoulder to shoulder to build something bigger than ourselves. Become one of the first franchisees at Gigglewaters and, as a torchbearer, carve your path in the history of our brand. Join us in shaping the future of dining and entertainment. The people behind the magic. Frank Fine President Read Bio × Frank Fine, President Frank has over 30 years of hotel and restaurant experience and served as SVP of American Inns Management, specializing in crisis management and company development with hotels and restaurants in Arizona, Nevada and California. He directly oversaw 75 hotels, restaurants and marinas and owned a number of his own. Frank is also a nationally certified counselor who specializes in critical incidents. He has been deployed as a first responder at the World Trade Center at 9/11, after major hurricanes, shootings and other national disasters for the past 30 years. Favorite Movie: A Few Good Men Rachel Wilson Chief Executive Officer Read Bio × Rachel Wilson, Chief Executive Officer Rachel brings over a decade of experience in franchised business management within the supplemental education sector, at one point serving as Vice President of US Operations and leading nationwide field support for franchisees. Before this, she founded a successful marketing company in New York City with a diverse client portfolio that included a prominent grocery store chain, 50 radio stations, and a major casino. Rachel spearheaded the development of the flagship Gigglewaters location, serving as its first General Manager. From day one, she built the brand and drove both operational and marketing strategies, establishing Gigglewaters as a premier destination. Favorite Movie: Labyrinth Richard Wilson Chief Creative Officer Read Bio × Richard Wilson, Chief Creative Officer Richie spent 17 years as Senior Broadcast Producer of the Howard Stern Show. Richie is also well known as the inventor of the viral sensation “Shittens“, which Redbook said, “broke the internet”. Here at Gigglewaters, Richie drove the creative direction, from decor and design to movie selections and creative promotions. Favorite Movie: Goodfellas In business for yourself, but never by yourself. The Gigglewaters ® team is with you every step of the way. We’ve worked hard over the past few years to build out a system and develop a support team so that you’re not in this alone. You’ll undergo an extensive hands-on training program where you’ll learn the critical details of operating your very own Gigglewaters. This training includes time in the field learning the ropes in our corporate store, working hand-in-hand with the key leadership staff at our Home Office, as well as on-site training at your location when you open. Our training and support helps you master everything you need to know to run a Gigglewaters. From how to hire and inspire a team to greatness, manage payroll, run inventories and track cost of goods, handle scheduling and recruiting, use technology to track key metrics, to marketing through community partnerships- we’re here as a resource and we’re in it with you for the long haul. We don’t stop when you start. Of course we’ll be at your Grand Opening. But our commitment to you goes far beyond that. You can count on long term, ongoing support from the entire corporate team. We believe it’s extraordinarily important to schedule regular check-ins to make sure operations are running smoothly, target metrics are being met and you’re achieving your fiscal goals. We take pride in our leadership team truly being just a phone call away. FAQs Have questions about franchising a Gigglewaters ® ? Read our FAQs below. Where are the current franchise opportunities? We are looking to open the initial franchise locations in Florida, focusing primarily throughout West Central Florida to start. Am I expected to work in my Gigglewaters restaurant? It’s important to be an engaged owner with your finger on the pulse of your business. We expect that our owners will be involved in the daily business and do not allow passive investors. That being said, an owner-operator could have partners in their franchise that are passive investors. How much capital do I need to invest? We require a minimum of $100K in liquid assets and a $450K net worth for the food truck and a minimum of $350K in liquid assets and a $1M net worth for the brick and mortar. What is your initial franchise fee and ongoing royalty fees? Our Initial Franchise Fee for a Brick & Mortar is $59,500, the Royalty Fee is 5% of Gross Sales and the Ad Fund is 1% of Gross Sales. Our Initial Franchise Fee for a Food Truck is $37,850. Food Truck Royalties are 5% of sales against a monthly minimum, and the Ad Fund is 1% of Gross Sales. Can I get financing? Although Gigglewaters does not provide direct financing, we have experience working with third-party lenders who can assist you in obtaining the necessary funding to launch your business. The market offers a wide range of financing options, and with the guidance of a third-party lender, you can gain a comprehensive understanding of the available choices and select the one that best suits your needs. Let’s see if you qualify! Will I have a territory? Yes. Our Brick & Mortar agreement stipulates a 5 mile radius/10 mile diameter* from another brick & mortar location. Our Food Truck territories are based on contiguous zip codes of 500,000 population*, excluding a half mile radius from any established Brick & Mortar. *Exceptions are listed in the FDD for densely populated areas. I have never run a restaurant before. Is Gigglewaters still a good business opportunity for me? You can definitely still own and operate a Gigglewaters ® because we give you all the training and support you need. We’re looking for candidates with a willingness to work hard and a great attitude; we can teach you the rest. What kind of neighborhood does Gigglewaters need to thrive? An ideal neighborhood is a walkable, lively community. We appeal to all ages- we’ve got first dates, young families & retirees all enjoying the classic movies, delicious food, and award-winning cocktails. There’s something for everyone in every community. Can I invest in just the food truck? Yes! The food truck is a standalone franchise opportunity for those investors looking for a lower cost mobile business. It’s also a great way to get started in the Gigglewaters franchise family with potential to expand to a brick and mortar restaurant! We have options for both trucks and trailers, with an Initial Investment starting from only $113,000! What kind of training and support can I expect to receive? We have a comprehensive, 4-week training program where we’ll teach you all facets of the business. That training is a combination of virtual, in-person and hands-on in our flagship location in Safety Harbor, and then additional on-site training will be provided at your Gigglewaters location. Training and support continues well after your opening; we’re always here to help. How do I get started? Simply complete and submit the brief inquiry form below now and someone from our Franchise Development team will contact you shortly. We Don’t Just Make a Burger We Make a Difference. We’ve won countless awards, including ‘Best Burger in Tampa Bay’, ‘Best Cocktails’, ‘Best Brunch’, and more. However, that’s not what we’re most proud of at Gigglewaters ® . It’s a program we created called “Giggles for Good”. Ready for an experience you can’t help but love? We invite you to join the Gigglewaters ® franchise family and experience the magic of bringing people together. About US - Gigglewaters MENU MENU ORDER TO GO ABOUT US ABOUT US GIGGLES FOR GOOD PRESS ROOM CAREERS FOOD TRUCKS FRANCHISING MOVIES SPECIAL EVENTS About Us If you wanted a cocktail in the late 1920s, you’d ask for a “giggle water”; an alcoholic beverage and the namesake inspiration for Gigglewaters, the restaurant, bar, and one screen classic movie theater in the heart of downtown Safety Harbor. Since 2018 When owners Richie Wilson & Rachel Fine moved to Florida from Brooklyn in 2015, they were happy to trade snow for sunshine. They missed some of their favorite New York City haunts and started conceptualizing a way to bring some of those best gems together to create a truly unique dining and entertainment experience for their new hometown. Missing the old architecture of NYC, they decided to create a speakeasy-style establishment that celebrated the prohibition era and found the perfect building with a rich history in the heart of downtown Safety Harbor. They added tin ceilings, Edison lighting, and a custom bar built of upcycled wood from the historic Belleview Biltmore, circa 1897. And while the look may be swanky, the menu is anything but pretentious. It’s classic American comfort food, kicked up a notch- over a dozen unique, delicious pure Wagyu beef burgers, bacon-wrapped deep-fried quarter-pound hot dogs piled high, housemade Butcher Block Bacon soaked in bourbon & brown sugar, ridiculous mac & cheeses and an award-winning cocktail list. They incorporated some of their NYC favorites, like Frito pie and ricotta cheesecake. The menu is as craveable as it is inspired and was featured on Travel Channel’s Man v. Food for that reason. You can join us for a meal in the dining room or you can walk through the double doors in the back and into an intimate, 32-seat movie theater that shows classic movies while you eat. We show an array of favorites, from The Goonies to The Godfather. The theater is full service; the entire menu is available while you watch (or sing-a-long to) your favorite flick. You can see this month’s movie lineup and get your $5 tickets HERE . Gigglewaters isn’t just a restaurant, it’s an experience. We’ve had proposals and full weddings, hosted family reunions, watched Die Hard on Christmas and rang in every New Years Eve with our infamous Rocky Picture Show four course dinner event. We believe in bringing people together to a place of a thousand good times. Your best night out, an experience you can’t help but love. Stop in and grab a “giggle water” with us today! Meet the Owners! FRANK FINE - PRESIDENT Frank has over 30 years of hotel and restaurant experience and served as SVP of American Inns Management, specializing in crisis management and company development with hotels and restaurants in Arizona, Nevada and California. He directly oversaw 75 hotels, restaurants and marinas and owned a number of his own. Frank is also a nationally certified counselor who specializes in critical incidents. He has been deployed as a first responder at the World Trade Center at 9/11, after major hurricanes, shootings and other national disasters for the past 30 years. RACHEL WILSON - CEO Rachel has more than 10 years of experience in franchised business management with supplemental education companies. She has worked in television for a number of years as well, hosting multiple TV shows for Howard Stern and as a ghost hunter on The Travel Channel. Rachel directed the build-out of the flagship Gigglewaters and was its first General Manager. She built the brand and drove operational and marketing strategy from day one. RICHARD WILSON - CCO Richie spent 17 years as Senior Broadcast Producer of the Howard Stern Show. Richie is also well known as the inventor of the viral sensation “Shittens“, which Redbook said, “broke the internet”. Here at Gigglewaters, Richie drove the creative direction, from decor and design to movie selections and creative promotions. Awards Gigglewaters is honored to have been recognized as winners of the following awards: 2018 Best of the Bay Best New Restaurant Beer & Burger Throwdown Best Signature Burger 2019 Best of the Bay Best Cocktails Best Brunch Best Brunch for Boozing Best Whiskey Bar Best Tequila Bar Best Grilled Cheese 2nd Runner Up for Best All Around Restaurant, Behind Bern’s Steak House 2020 Best of the Bay Best Burgers Best Whiskey Bar Best Neighborhood Bar in Pinellas County Best of Safety Harbor Best Gourmet Popcorn 2021 Tampa Bay Times: Best of the Best Best Cocktail Bar in Tampa Bay Best Neighborhood Bar in Tampa Bay Best of the Bay Best Neighborhood Bar in Pinellas Best Safety Harbor Restaurant Best Grilled Cheese Best Gourmet Popcorn 2022 Tampa Bay Times: Best of the Best Best Hamburger Restaurant Best Brunch Best Cocktail Bar Best Romantic Restaurant Best Neighborhood Bar Best of the Bay Best Whiskey Bar Best NeighborhoodBar Pinellas Best of Safety Harbor Best Waitstaff Best Grilled Cheese Time Out Named one of the 11 Best Restaurants in Tampa Visit St. Pete/Clearwater Best Cocktails Featured on Cooking Channel’s Man vs. Food JOIN OUR NEWSLETTER! Your best night out, an experience you can’t help but love. “Gigglewaters ® has emerged as a place that makes visitors feel like they are living a celluloid dream.” (-USA Today) You’ve never been to a restaurant like this. Gigglewaters ® is more than just a culinary destination; it’s an immersive dining experience that transcends the ordinary. From the moment you step through our doors, you’ll feel the energy and excitement that sets us apart. With award-winning cuisine, innovative cocktails, and an intimate movie theater, Gigglewaters ® offers a unique blend of nostalgia and community that you just won’t find anywhere else. Gigglewaters ® isn’t just another restaurant—it’s an experience waiting to be discovered. Request Info Experience the magic of bringing people together. We’re looking for trailblazers. Do you ever look around at the established franchise brands with hundreds of units and wonder what it would have been like to be one of the first? To have your choice of prime territories? To work hand-in-hand with the founders as you brought a proven concept to the masses? To be more than just another number in the system, but a pioneer that helped build a legacy from the beginning? That’s what’s on the table right now at Gigglewaters. And these opportunities don’t arise every day. Be a trailblazer in the Gigglewaters franchise family and seize the opportunity to claim your territory as one of our inaugural franchisees. Sure, it’s fresh ground, but that’s precisely where the magic lies. And while the concept is new, our senior executives have a combined 40 years of restaurant and franchising experience. Together, we’ll work shoulder to shoulder to build something bigger than ourselves. Become one of the first franchisees at Gigglewaters and, as a torchbearer, carve your path in the history of our brand. Join us in shaping the future of dining and entertainment. Brick & Mortar Our full service restaurant, bar & one screen classic movie theater is unlike any concept we’ve come across and we’re looking for people who are equally extraordinary. From finding a location, to build out, grand opening & ongoing operations, we’ll be there to support you every step of the way. If you’ve ever dreamed of owning your own Gigglewaters ® , click the button below and take the first step. Request Info Food Trucks Our Gigglewaters ® Mobile Kitchen combines our award-winning food with the excitement of life on the road! Set your own schedule, be your own boss and bring the Giggles to a neighborhood near you! Our state-of-the-art Food Trucks and Trailers set the standard for a mobile Gigglewaters experience. If you’ve always wanted to live a life full of adventure and travel while running a show-stopping Food Truck, click the button below and get started today. The people behind the magic. Frank Fine President Read Bio × Frank Fine, President Frank has over 30 years of hotel and restaurant experience and served as SVP of American Inns Management, specializing in crisis management and company development with hotels and restaurants in Arizona, Nevada and California. He directly oversaw 75 hotels, restaurants and marinas and owned a number of his own. Frank is also a nationally certified counselor who specializes in critical incidents. He has been deployed as a first responder at the World Trade Center at 9/11, after major hurricanes, shootings and other national disasters for the past 30 years. Favorite Movie: A Few Good Men Rachel Wilson Chief Executive Officer Read Bio × Rachel Wilson, Chief Executive Officer Rachel brings over a decade of experience in franchised business management within the supplemental education sector, at one point serving as Vice President of US Operations and leading nationwide field support for franchisees. Before this, she founded a successful marketing company in New York City with a diverse client portfolio that included a prominent grocery store chain, 50 radio stations, and a major casino. Rachel spearheaded the development of the flagship Gigglewaters location, serving as its first General Manager. From day one, she built the brand and drove both operational and marketing strategies, establishing Gigglewaters as a premier destination. Favorite Movie: Labyrinth Richard Wilson Chief Creative Officer Read Bio × Richard Wilson, Chief Creative Officer Richie spent 17 years as Senior Broadcast Producer of the Howard Stern Show. Richie is also well known as the inventor of the viral sensation “Shittens“, which Redbook said, “broke the internet”. Here at Gigglewaters, Richie drove the creative direction, from decor and design to movie selections and creative promotions. Favorite Movie: Goodfellas In business for yourself, but never by yourself. The Gigglewaters ® team is with you every step of the way. We’ve worked hard over the past few years to build out a system and develop a support team so that you’re not in this alone. You’ll undergo an extensive hands-on training program where you’ll learn the critical details of operating your very own Gigglewaters. This training includes time in the field learning the ropes in our corporate store, working hand-in-hand with the key leadership staff at our Home Office, as well as on-site training at your location when you open. Our training and support helps you master everything you need to know to run a Gigglewaters. From how to hire and inspire a team to greatness, manage payroll, run inventories and track cost of goods, handle scheduling and recruiting, use technology to track key metrics, to marketing through community partnerships- we’re here as a resource and we’re in it with you for the long haul. We don’t stop when you start. Of course we’ll be at your Grand Opening. But our commitment to you goes far beyond that. You can count on long term, ongoing support from the entire corporate team. We believe it’s extraordinarily important to schedule regular check-ins to make sure operations are running smoothly, target metrics are being met and you’re achieving your fiscal goals. We take pride in our leadership team truly being just a phone call away. FAQs Have questions about franchising a Gigglewaters ® ? Read our FAQs below. Where are the current franchise opportunities? We are looking to open the initial franchise locations in Florida, focusing primarily throughout West Central Florida to start. Am I expected to work in my Gigglewaters restaurant? It’s important to be an engaged owner with your finger on the pulse of your business. We expect that our owners will be involved in the daily business and do not allow passive investors. That being said, an owner-operator could have partners in their franchise that are passive investors. How much capital do I need to invest? We require a minimum of $100K in liquid assets and a $450K net worth for the food truck and a minimum of $350K in liquid assets and a $1M net worth for the brick and mortar. What is your initial franchise fee and ongoing royalty fees? Our Initial Franchise Fee for a Brick & Mortar is $59,500, the Royalty Fee is 5% of Gross Sales and the Ad Fund is 1% of Gross Sales. Our Initial Franchise Fee for a Food Truck is $37,850. Food Truck Royalties are 5% of sales against a monthly minimum, and the Ad Fund is 1% of Gross Sales. Can I get financing? Although Gigglewaters does not provide direct financing, we have experience working with third-party lenders who can assist you in obtaining the necessary funding to launch your business. The market offers a wide range of financing options, and with the guidance of a third-party lender, you can gain a comprehensive understanding of the available choices and select the one that best suits your needs. Let’s see if you qualify! Will I have a territory? Yes. Our Brick & Mortar agreement stipulates a 5 mile radius/10 mile diameter* from another brick & mortar location. Our Food Truck territories are based on contiguous zip codes of 500,000 population*, excluding a half mile radius from any established Brick & Mortar. *Exceptions are listed in the FDD for densely populated areas. I have never run a restaurant before. Is Gigglewaters still a good business opportunity for me? You can definitely still own and operate a Gigglewaters ® because we give you all the training and support you need. We’re looking for candidates with a willingness to work hard and a great attitude; we can teach you the rest. What kind of neighborhood does Gigglewaters need to thrive? An ideal neighborhood is a walkable, lively community. We appeal to all ages- we’ve got first dates, young families & retirees all enjoying the classic movies, delicious food, and award-winning cocktails. There’s something for everyone in every community. Can I invest in just the food truck? Yes! The food truck is a standalone franchise opportunity for those investors looking for a lower cost mobile business. It’s also a great way to get started in the Gigglewaters franchise family with potential to expand to a brick and mortar restaurant! We have options for both trucks and trailers, with an Initial Investment starting from only $113,000! What kind of training and support can I expect to receive? We have a comprehensive, 4-week training program where we’ll teach you all facets of the business. That training is a combination of virtual, in-person and hands-on in our flagship location in Safety Harbor, and then additional on-site training will be provided at your Gigglewaters location. Training and support continues well after your opening; we’re always here to help. How do I get started? Simply complete and submit the brief inquiry form below now and someone from our Franchise Development team will contact you shortly. We Don’t Just Make a Burger We Make a Difference. We’ve won countless awards, including ‘Best Burger in Tampa Bay’, ‘Best Cocktails’, ‘Best Brunch’, and more. However, that’s not what we’re most proud of at Gigglewaters ® . It’s a program we created called “Giggles for Good”. Ready for an experience you can’t help but love? We invite you to join the Gigglewaters ® franchise family and experience the magic of bringing people together.
